Sentencas: Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x nanopowders were successfully synthesized by a microwave-induced combustion process.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and ion conductivity of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: The phase identification, ionic conductivity and thermal expansion coefficient of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics were investigated in the current study.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and ion conductivity of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: The results revealed that the bulk densities of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics sintered at 1450 degrees C for 3 h were all greater than 94% of the in theoretical densities, the maximum ionic conductivity of the sintered specimens was 0.047 S/cm at 850 degrees C for Ce0.84La0.16O1.92.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and ion conductivity of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: Moreover, the minimum activity energy E, determined from 500 to 850 degrees C for Ce0.84La0.16O1.92 was 0.759 eV.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and ion conductivity of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: It is found that the ionic conductivity increased with decreasing thermal expansion coefficients For Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics, the ionic conductivity increased with La doping concentration until x = 0.16, and then decreased.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and ion conductivity of Ce1-xLaxO2-1/2x ceramics
